content.text: I can't recall if any episodes refer to Tyrone's species. It may seem common sense, but in case anyone makes an argument he's some other kind of antlered creature like a caribou, I found an old description on Netflix which describes him, archived at https://web.archive.org/web/20180719142619/https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search
This appears to have been subsequently altered though at https://www.netflix.com/ca/title/70177018
I'm not sure why Netflix removed the species. talk2ty 14:30, July 19, 2018 (UTC)
The lyrics of Laser Limbo directly mentioned what he is, and the episode Knights Are Brave and Strong made no secret of his species, as well.
